hits.definition:
男

[nán] male, (= 男人 nánrén) man

照

[zhào] shine; 照相 zhàoxiàng photo

群

[qún] crowd, group; 群众 qúnzhòng The Masses

热 (F 熱)

[rè] hot

推

[tuī] push

响 (F 響)

[xiǎng] sound; 影响 yǐngxiǎng influence

称 (F 稱)

[chēng] weigh, name

[chèn] 对称 duìchèn symmetric

兴 (F 興)

[xìng] 高兴 gāoxìng glad

[xīng] 兴奋 xīngfèn excited

{Compare with 六 liù six}

待

[dài] treat, entertain, wait for

[dāi] (= 呆 dāi) stay

约 (F 約)

[yuē] approximately, arrange, appointment

[yāo] weigh
